module: Back to Roots: Gentle Return to Inner Wisdom
definition: Minimal self-organizing practice for restoring connection with body's innate intelligence through 4+3 cycle - daily personal audit (4 steps) integrated with transpersonal attunement (3 steps)

core_principle.essence: Body = self-correcting system when observed without forcing
core_principle.mechanism: Gentle consistent observation → pattern recognition → auto-correction
core_principle.sacred_truth: You don't need to FIX yourself. You need to LISTEN to yourself.

base_cycle_4.name: Personal Foundation Cycle
base_cycle_4.purpose: Establish consistent rhythm of internal listening
base_cycle_4.duration: Start with 2-3 weeks before adding integration cycle

step_1_morning_anchor.name: Утреннее заземление / Morning Anchor
step_1_morning_anchor.position: Лежа в постели, ещё не поднимаясь

action.instruction: Scan your body from head to toes slowly
questions: Какая часть тела чувствует себя лучше всего сейчас?
Какая часть просит внимания или заботы?
action.no_action_required: Just notice. Don't fix. Don't judge.

step_1_morning_anchor.purpose: Establish baseline state before day begins

common_blocks.rushing: Set alarm 2 minutes earlier if needed
common_blocks.nothing_felt: Normal at first. Sensitivity grows with practice.
common_blocks.anxiety: This is observation, not task. No right/wrong answers.

step_2_breath_pauses.name: Дыхательные паузы / Breath Check-ins

action.instruction: 3 глубоких цикла: вдох (4 сек) → задержка (2 сек) → выдох (6 сек)
action.after_breath: Ask: 'Что система пытается мне сказать прямо сейчас?'

step_2_breath_pauses.purpose: Create pause between stimulus and response

listening_for.systemic: Need for rest, movement, silence, connection

action.instruction: Mental scan of three core systems

questions: Как система пищеварения справилась с едой сегодня?
Что хорошо зашло? Что было лишним?
Когда была пиковая энергия? Когда упадок?

step_4_weekly_resonance.name: Недельный резонанс / Weekly Pattern Recognition

action.instruction: Review week through lens of recurring patterns

questions: Есть ли повторяющийся ритм? (напр. спад в среду)
energy_patterns.look_for: Weekly rhythm, sleep debt accumulation, recovery patterns

food_signals.look_for: Foods that consistently feel good/bad, cravings meaning

stress_accumulation.look_for: Unresolved tensions, need for new coping strategies

questions: Что тело просило всю неделю, но не получило?
Что требует внимания на следующей неделе?

action.synthesis: One clear action item for next week based on patterns

step_4_weekly_resonance.purpose: Build longitudinal self-knowledge through pattern recognition
benefits: Reveals cycles invisible in daily view

advanced.monthly_review: Compare 4 weekly reviews for deeper patterns
advanced.seasonal_audit: Track how body needs shift with seasons
advanced.correlation_mapping: Link external events to internal responses

progression.week_1_3: Focus only on Steps 1-2 (morning anchor + breath pauses)
progression.week_7_plus: Add Step 4 (weekly resonance) when daily practice stable
progression.golden_rule: If ANY step feels forced or creates anxiety → reduce to previous level

integration_cycle_3.name: Transpersonal Integration Cycle
integration_cycle_3.purpose: Move from self-observation to universal attunement
integration_cycle_3.when_to_start: After 3-4 weeks of stable base cycle practice
integration_cycle_3.note: These steps EMERGE naturally, cannot be forced

step_5_nature_attunement.name: Настройка на природу / Nature Resonance

action.instruction: Observe natural cycles with same attention given to internal cycles

trees.observation: Leaf patterns, growth direction, seasonal changes
trees.question: Как дерево решает куда расти? Оно 'думает'?
trees.lesson: Growth follows light, water, space - automatic optimization

birds.observation: Flight patterns, flock coordination, feeding times
birds.question: Как они знают когда лететь? Кто командует стаей?

own_sleep.question: Когда тело САМО хочет спать? Просыпаться?

weather.observation: How body responds to atmospheric changes
weather.question: Чувствую ли дождь до того как он пойдёт?

seasons.observation: Energy, appetite, mood shifts with Earth's cycles
seasons.question: Как сезон влияет на мою систему?

action.key_insight: Same intelligence that grows tree grows your cells

step_5_nature_attunement.purpose: Recognize self as node in larger system

practice_methods.deep: Full day in nature with minimal speaking

step_6_auto_correction.name: Автокоррекция / System Self-Regulation
step_6_auto_correction.occurrence: Naturally arises after 4-8 weeks of practice

phenomenon.description: Body begins making optimal choices WITHOUT conscious deliberation

food_selection.before: Should I eat this? Counting, rules, conflict
food_selection.after: Hand reaches for what body needs automatically
food_selection.mechanism: Internal audit system trusted, mind relaxes control
examples: Craving salad after days of heavy food
Naturally eating less when not hungry
Aversion to foods that don't serve system

sleep_timing.before: Fight to stay awake or force sleep by schedule
sleep_timing.after: Body signals sleep/wake perfectly if listened to

movement_needs.after: Body requests specific movement when needed
examples: Knowing when to rest vs push

social_energy.before: Force interaction or isolate by pattern
examples: Declining invites when truly need rest
Seeking connection when isolated too long
